lobby.title: Abraxas
lobby.subtitle: Arena
lobby.no_champions: No champions yet. Create your first character to enter the arena.

error.char_name_invalid: Each word must start with a capital letter and contain only letters (e.g. Dark Knight)
error.title: Error

WARRIOR.name: Warrior
WARRIOR.longDesc: A master of close-quarters combat with high survivability.

MAGE.name: Mage
MAGE.longDesc: Wields destructive arcane power from a distance.

RANGER.name: Ranger
RANGER.longDesc: Swift and precise, striking foes before they can react.

ROGUE.name: Rogue
ROGUE.longDesc: A shadowy assassin specializing in speed and critical strikes.

CLERIC.name: Cleric
CLERIC.longDesc: A holy defender who blends combat with divine protection.

PALADIN.name: Paladin
PALADIN.longDesc: An armored holy warrior who combines devastating melee with divine healing and protection.

NECROMANCER.name: Necromancer
NECROMANCER.longDesc: A dark sorcerer who commands the dead and drains the life force of enemies.

DRUID.name: Druid
DRUID.longDesc: A versatile guardian of nature capable of shapeshifting and healing.

game.too_far_merchant: You are too far from a merchant
game.not_available: That item is not available here
game.only_buy_one: You can only buy one of that item at a time
game.quest_near_npc: You must be near the quest NPC to complete this quest
game.trade_failed_accept: Failed to accept trade. Participant might be busy.
game.trade_failed_validation: Trade validation failed (inventory full or items missing)
game.invalid_target_los: Target not in line of sight
game.connection_failed_desc: Failed to connect to server. Is it running?
game.logged_in_elsewhere: Session closed: Logged in from another location.
game.tame_too_far: You are too far away to tame that!
game.tame_no_lasso: You need a Lasso to tame animals!
game.tame_success_dropped: You tamed the {{item}} but your bags are full. It dropped to the ground!
game.tame_failed: The animal broke free! Your lasso was consumed.

social.already_in_group: Player is already in a group
social.leader_only_invite: Only the group leader can invite
social.no_invite: No active invitation for this group
social.leader_only_kick: Only the leader can kick players
social.kicked_from_group: You were kicked from the group

group.not_in_group: Not in a group. Invite someone to start one.

guild.not_in_guild: Not in a guild. Join or create one.

war_cry.name: War Cry
war_cry.desc: Bellow a battle cry, boosting your STR for 8s.

shield_bash.name: Shield Bash
shield_bash.desc: Slam your shield into a foe, stunning them for 2s.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.desc: Spin your weapon, damaging all adjacent enemies.

battle_shout.name: Battle Shout
battle_shout.desc: Shout that reduces armor of all nearby enemies for 6s.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.desc: Hurl a blazing bolt at a distant target.

ice_bolt.name: Ice Bolt
ice_bolt.desc: A shard of ice that pierces through magical defenses.

thunderstorm.name: Thunderstorm
thunderstorm.desc: Call down lightning at a location, hitting all nearby enemies.

poison_arrow.name: Poison Arrow
poison_arrow.desc: Hurl a toxic arrow that deals nature damage over time.

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.desc: Focus on dodging attacks, increasing Agility for a short duration.

aimed_shot.name: Aimed Shot
aimed_shot.desc: A precise shot that deals heavy damage to a single target.

mark_target.name: Mark Target
mark_target.desc: Mark a target, making them more vulnerable to your attacks.

backstab.name: Backstab
backstab.desc: Strike from the shadows for massive damage if behind the target.

envenom.name: Envenom
envenom.desc: Coat your blades in deadly poison.

smoke_bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
smoke_bomb.desc: Create a cloud of smoke that confuses enemies and hides you.

hemorrhage.name: Hemorrhage
hemorrhage.desc: Strike a target, causing them to bleed profusely.

holy_strike.name: Holy Strike
holy_strike.desc: Infuse your weapon with light, dealing holy damage.

heal.name: Heal
heal.desc: Restore health to yourself or an ally.

divine_shield.name: Divine Shield
divine_shield.desc: Surround yourself with a shield of pure light.

holy_nova.name: Holy Nova
holy_nova.desc: An explosion of light that heals allies and damages foes.

bear_form.name: Bear Form
bear_form.desc: Channel the spirit of nature to transform into a bear, massively increasing your HP.

cat_form.name: Cat Form
cat_form.desc: Transform into a swift cat, increasing Agility and Movement Speed.

tree_form.name: Tree Form
tree_form.desc: Take the form of an ancient tree, boosting Intelligence and Mana regeneration.

mimic.name: Mimic
mimic.desc: Copy the appearance of any creature you can see.

summon_zombie.name: Summon Zombie
summon_zombie.desc: Consume souls to raise a sturdy zombie minion.

soul_blast.name: Soul Blast
soul_blast.desc: Unleash collected souls in a devastating blast of necrotic energy.

curse.name: Curse
curse.desc: Afflict a target with a dark curse, reducing their attributes.

smite.name: Smite
smite.desc: Call down divine wrath upon your enemy.

judgment.name: Judgment
judgment.desc: Pass judgment on a foe, dealing holy damage and slowing them.

lay_on_hands.name: Lay on Hands
lay_on_hands.desc: Instantly restore a large amount of health.

consecration.name: Consecration
consecration.desc: Bless the ground, damaging all enemies who stand upon it.

aura_of_protection.name: Aura of Protection
aura_of_protection.desc: A protective aura that boosts the armor of nearby allies.

holy_bolt.name: Holy Bolt
holy_bolt.desc: Fiery bolt of light that strikes a target from afar.

summon_skeleton.name: Summon Skeleton
summon_skeleton.desc: Raise a loyal skeletal warrior to fight by your side.

shadow_bolt.name: Shadow Bolt
shadow_bolt.desc: A bolt of dark energy that strikes with necrotic force.

soul_drain.name: Soul Drain
soul_drain.desc: Drain the lifeforce of a target, healing yourself.

banshee_wail.name: Banshee Wail
banshee_wail.desc: A terrifying scream that weakens the armor of all nearby foes.

cleanse_paralysis.name: Cleanse Stun
cleanse_paralysis.desc: Remove all stun and paralysis effects from an ally.

detect_invisibility.name: True Vision
detect_invisibility.desc: Briefly reveals all cloaked units in a wide area.

elemental_infusion.name: Elemental Infusion
elemental_infusion.desc: Increases INT for a short duration.

spell_echo.name: Spell Echo
spell_echo.desc: Next spell you cast will echo, triggering twice.

mana_spring.name: Mana Spring
mana_spring.desc: Summons a crystal that restores mana to nearby allies.

polymorph.name: Polymorph
polymorph.desc: Transforms the target into a sheep.

entangling_roots.name: Entangling Roots
entangling_roots.desc: Roots enemies in place and deals nature damage.

explosive_trap.name: Explosive Trap
explosive_trap.desc: Place a trap that explodes when stepped on.

pet_bond.name: Pet Bond
pet_bond.desc: Boosts AGI for the duration of the buff.

eagle_eye.name: Eagle Eye
eagle_eye.desc: Massively increases your AGI for a duration.

barrage.name: Barrage
barrage.desc: Fire a rapid burst of arrows in a wide area.

shadowstep.name: Shadowstep
shadowstep.desc: Instantly teleports you behind your target.

caltrops.name: Caltrops
caltrops.desc: Drop spikes that slow and damage enemies.

fan_of_knives.name: Fan of Knives
fan_of_knives.desc: Throw a circle of daggers around you.

poison_bite.name: Poison Bite
poison_bite.desc: Afflicts the target with a lingering poison.

web_shot.name: Web Shot
web_shot.desc: Fires a web that stuns the target.

enrage.name: Enrage
enrage.desc: Increase strength for a short duration.

frost_breath.name: Frost Breath
frost_breath.desc: A burst of frost that slows enemies.

disease_bite.name: Diseased Bite
disease_bite.desc: Afflicts the target with a long-lasting disease.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.desc: Shakes the earth, stunning and damaging nearby enemies.

leap.name: Leap
leap.desc: Jumps to a target location, damaging and stunning enemies.

execute.name: Execute
execute.desc: Deals massive damage to low-health targets.

cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.desc: A wide strike that hits multiple nearby targets.

shield_wall.name: Shield Wall
shield_wall.desc: Massively increases armor for a duration.

meteor_strike.name: Meteor Strike
meteor_strike.desc: Summon a meteor to deal massive area fire damage.

chain_lightning.name: Chain Lightning
chain_lightning.desc: Discharges lightning that jumps between enemies.

acid_splash.name: Acid Splash
acid_splash.desc: AoE damage that reduces enemy armor over time.

mana_shield.name: Mana Shield
mana_shield.desc: Convert mana into a protective arcane shell (+armor for 6s).

frost_nova.name: Frost Nova
frost_nova.desc: Explosion of frost that damages all enemies around you.

arcane_surge.name: Arcane Surge
arcane_surge.desc: Channel immense arcane power into a devastating bolt.

multi_shot.name: Multi Shot
multi_shot.desc: Loose a volley of arrows hitting enemies in a small area.

map.title: WORLD MAP
map.help: Use warps in the world to travel between zones. Press M or ESC to close.

merchant.title: MERCHANT ESTABLISHMENT
merchant.no_items_sell: Your chests contain no tradable merchandise

bank.title: Royal Vault
bank.subtitle: Secure Asset Repository
bank.empty_selection: Select an item to manage your assets

dialogue.greeting_merchant: Welcome, traveler! Take a look at my wares.
dialogue.greeting_banker: Your gold is safe with us. How can I assist you?
dialogue.reward_prompt: Great work on {{title}}! Here is your reward.

goblin_raid.name: Goblin Raid
goblin_raid.desc: A horde of goblins is attacking the settlement!

undead_surge.name: Undead Surge
undead_surge.desc: The dead rise from their graves ‚Äî defend the living!

dragon_sighting.name: Dragon Sighting
dragon_sighting.desc: A fearsome dragon has been spotted circling the skies!

troll_invasion.name: Troll Invasion
troll_invasion.desc: A war party of trolls is storming the settlement!

spider_swarm.name: Spider Swarm
spider_swarm.desc: Thousands of giant spiders are emerging from hidden lairs!

vampire_hunt.name: Vampire Hunt
vampire_hunt.desc: Ancient vampires have risen ‚Äî protect the living before dawn!

arena.name: Arena
arena.desc: The starting grounds. Goblins, orcs, and wolves roam the plains.

forest.name: Whispering Forest
forest.desc: A dense forest filled with wolves, bears, and restless spirits.

dungeon.name: Catacombs
dungeon.desc: Ancient ruins haunted by the undead and guarded by a fearsome dragon.

scoreboard.title: Scoreboard
scoreboard.level_private: Level is private ‚Äî only you can see yours

tips: Never turn your back on a Rogue in the dark corners of the Arena.
Warriors favor strength, but a focused mind can pierce any plate.
Goblins are cowards, but their numbers can overwhelm the unwary.
The Lich of the Depths has not been seen for centuries... until now.
Potions are brewed from the essence of fallen elementals.

trade.title: Trade
trade.add_items_hint: Add Items (click to add ¬∑ click offer to remove)

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.hint: Top 10 players per category ‚Äî updated on disconnect

slime_slayer.title: Slime Slayer
slime_slayer.description: The local merchant needs help dealing with some pesky slimes outside of town. Defeat 5 slimes and return to him.

tutorial_talk.title: The Adventure Begins
tutorial_talk.description: Welcome to the world of Abraxas! Talk to the merchant in town to learn the ropes.
